description: Built my own workstation from scratch on a tight budget and transitioned to Linux to support high performance AI workloads.
Mastered container orchastration by deploying apps for personal use, enhancing MLOps and DevOps skills
Acquired certification in CrewAI and automated workflows using LLMs.
Experimented with Flutter/Dart to realize an app rooted in personal passion, expanding into full stack capabilities
Conducted advanced LoRA models training to generate graphics for marketing content.
Experimented with models like Trellis to generate 3D artifacts and integrated into Unreal Engine for video game prototyping.
